name: The Apologetic Phantom
description: A shadowy enigma draped in regret, this NFT features a sleek, slim skull with a sharply defined faceâ€”an embodiment of mystery and quiet sorrow. A black cap sits atop its head, boldly embroidered with the word 'SORRY,' matching the black t-shirt that carries the same haunting message. A symbol of unspoken words and unsent apologies, this piece captures the essence of reflection, darkness, and untold stories.
